sig_info: Each time Miles completes a Spider-Challenge he gains a Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by +31.85 to 91.86 for 12 seconds.
Additionally, he may now complete Spider-Challenges multiple times during the fight instead of just once each. However, each Spider-Challenge can still only grant 1 Spider-Sense Charge.
